content: flowers are an easy way to get through your yarn scraps and can be used in a variety of ways three different styles of flower are included here along with 50 ideas on how to use your new crochet bouquet a sampling of the ideas 33 slip onto your shower curtain rings to brighten up your bathroom decor 34 wear on your keychain for a flower-power boost 35 hang several over your baby s crib for an instant mobile 36 attach to your ceiling fan s chains to brighten up the fixtures
